archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.6f: f) analysed prior to being sent to the SOC to reduce the volume of data (e.g. by analysing data on endpoint or similar devices, in-transit, or stored in data lakes).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
